deploy.startCommand: sh -c 'echo "Current directory: $(pwd)" && echo "Listing files:" && ls -la && echo "Looking for JAR in target:" && ls -la target/ 2>/dev/null || echo "target/ not found" && echo "Searching for JAR files:" && find . -name "*.jar" 2>/dev/null && JAR=$(find . -name "hibp-service-*.jar" ! -name "*-original.jar" 2>/dev/null | head -1) && if [ -z "$JAR" ]; then echo "ERROR: JAR not found!"; exit 1; fi && echo "Found JAR: $JAR" && java -jar "$JAR"'
